name: Perimeter: Emperor's Testament
description: The game expands the story of the original Perimeter in a vast singleplayer campaign.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8 Processor: Intel Pentium 4+ or AMD Athlon XP 2GHz and faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia or AMD video card with 128Mb VRAM or more DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Online play no longer supported, LAN play is possible
